string.value: The feeling I had within was confirmed by #b#p2081007##k. There is a way to unlock more of the dragon's power. I will not rest until I have discovered it. Raul has been helpful thus far--I wonder if he'd be willing to assist me again...
Raul has agreed to help me again. I'm to gather #b35 #t04031484##k if I want to raise #q2321003#'s power. \n\n#i4031484##t4031484# #b#c4031484#/35#k
Another long, but successful hunt. I gave Raul #t04031484#, and he increased #q2321003#'s power even more. When will the dragon reach its full power? It seems to be limitless...
You already have #q2321003#. The power of dragon is infinite so it takes a lot of effort to increase its power even more. I think your dragon's power is strong enough... But what do you think?
If you want to increase your dragon's power, you'll need #t04031484#. Looking at the power of your dragon...#b35 #t04031484##k will do.

I wish I could increase its power all at once, but it's impossible. It is far too much for a baby dragon. You love your dragon, I'm sure you wouldn't want it hurt. I believe you understand this basic edict in the law of power: wield what you can, when you can.
You look satisfied with this much power. Impressive as it is, there is still more power within your dragon.
Great! You gathered 35#t04031484#. I can increase your dragon's power! #K
Good. Now your dragon is even stronger! It seems to radiate a sense of awesome power. #bBut, your dragon still has power that can be unlocked.#k
You haven't got 35#b#t04031484##k. As dragon's power gets stronger, I will need more #t04031484# to properly perform the ritual. Thank you.
